Name: My Dream is a Lost Memory
About the game: My Dream is a Lost Memory is a short interactive tale, it all starts with a dream and a feeling of deja vu. The story is about balancing leisure and work, understanding your limitations, respecting yourself and valuing those who love us. The game was based on my own memories, but also on stories told by friends and relatives. ♥ 10 min of gameplay. ♥ Story Focused. ♥ Point and click elements.
